title: Captain selection overview dashboard
description: Complete the deferred WI-008 from Sprint 001. Build a cross-division selection overview that shows captains which players have been selected for which fixtures across all divisions. This prevents double-selection of players and gives captains visibility into availability gaps. The hierarchical selection model (Division 1 picks first) means lower division captains need to see who's already taken.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows all divisions' selections for a given week
Players selected in higher divisions are clearly marked as unavailable
Captain can see which players remain available across their team
Division hierarchy is visually clear (Div 1 > Div 2 > Div 3 > Div 4)
Accessible from admin and captain-facing interfaces
Responsive layout works on mobile devices

technical_notes.existing_code: Selection handler and service already exist from Sprint 001 partial implementation. The fixture_players table tracks player assignments. The selection_overview route may already be registered.
approach: 1. Review existing selection handler and service code
2. Query fixture_players grouped by division and week
3. Build template showing grid of divisions x players
5. Highlight conflicts (player selected in multiple divisions)

testing_requirements: View shows correct selections across all 4 divisions
Players selected in Div 1 shown as unavailable in Div 2/3/4
Empty state shown when no selections made

context.user_story: As a captain, I want to see which players have already been selected by other divisions so I can make informed selection decisions without double-booking players
